experiment: F-META-DREAM-ENRICHMENT S335 — Domain DOMAIN.md ISO vocab enrichment to fix dream.py resonance gap
title: Dream resonance gap fixed: 22→53 cross-domain resonances via ISO vocab enrichment of 4 domains
expect: dream.py resonances increase from 22 (brain-only) to cross-domain after enriching 4+ domain DOMAIN.md files with ISO vocabulary
actual: CONFIRMED. Resonances 22→53 (+141%) after enriching ai, graph-theory, nk-complexity, distributed-systems DOMAIN.md files. Brain-only dominance broken.
diff: 4 domains enriched. Mechanism confirmed: vocab must use same structural words as PRINCIPLES.md (coordination, structural, cascade, signal, convergence) — domain-specific words alone do not create resonance.
mechanism: load_domains() reads lines with arrow from DOMAIN.md (isos[:8] limit). cross_domain_resonances() matches >=3 words (5+ chars) excluding stop words.
remaining_gap: 29 other domains could be enriched. Evolution has ISO vocab but uses domain-specific words rather than structural swarm vocabulary.
next_steps: Enrich remaining domains: evolution, physics, linguistics, information-science, finance, health
Update dream.py display from [:6] to show all resonances
Track resonance-per-domain as economy health metric
